nodes.text: Nlorna flower perfume was a sweet fragrance worn by Erisi Dlarit while she was impersonating a Kuati noble during her mission to Coruscant.

Michael A. Stackpole created nlorna flower perfume for X-Wing: Wedge's Gamble, published in 1996. James Luceno later wrote The New Jedi Order: Agents of Chaos II: Jedi Eclipse, which featured "nlora perfume"; this may be a misspelling of nlorna.
